Publish.LongDescription:
# Station Signage Mod **Enhance your train and subway stations with dynamic, informative signage!**
This mod adds **realistic signage systems** to stations, providing passengers with crucial information like **platform directions, exits, transfers, city line status, and real-time next train arrivals**. Perfect for immersion and functional transit systems!
**For full immersion**, pair this mod with **[Station Entrance Visuals](https://mods.paradoxplaza.com/mods/95823/Windows)** and **[Train Visuals](https://mods.paradoxplaza.com/mods/95885/Windows)** to create cohesive, visually stunning stations.
*(This is a **WE (Write Everywhere) Module**, requiring the base mod to function.)*
---
## 🚉 Key Features
### 🚆 Next Train Panel - Displays **real-time information** on the next arriving train. - Shows: - **Train distance** from the station (in meters or time). - **Model name** (e.g., "A12, B03"). - **Car occupancy** (how full each train car is).
### 🚏 Station Signage - Shows **station name, platform numbers, exits, and transfer options**. - Includes **line status updates** (delays, closures, etc.). - Customizable for different station layouts.
